column33: How did you hear about us?
column34: Please let us know where you heard about us?

column10: Left turning vehicle neatly struck pedestrian crossing the Reston Parkway from west to east on the south leg. Ped signal was green. Driver looked in shock.

Crossing Reston Parkway from NE corner to NW corner on Glade Dr. in crosswalk.  Have walk signal.  I'm on my bike going walking speed.  Driver is southbound on Reston Parkway, in turn lane to go West on Glade Dr. (turning right).  Driver speeds to red light and goes through it.  I yell, she sees me in crosswalk and slams on her brakes, stopping over crosswalk 2 feet from me. I saw her and stopped short of the turning lane. So when stopped her driver's door is right in front of me.  No one was hurt.
column21: Too many drivers don't even slow on red light.
